metadata.Title: CVE-2016-3879 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: arm-wt-22k/lib_src/eas_mdls.c in mediaserver in Android 4.x before 4.4.4,5.0.x before 5.0.2, 5.1.x before 5.1.1, and 6.x before 2016-09-01 allowsremote attackers to cause a denial of service (NULL pointer dereference,and device hang or reboot) via a crafted media file, aka internal bug29770686.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
